entry.title: Armenia‚Äôs 2021 economic growth forecast doubled, says World Bank

media:group.media:title: Armenia‚Äôs 2021 economic growth forecast doubled, says World Bank
media:group.media:description:
üìçThe World Bank has revised Armenia‚Äôs economic growth forecast for 2021, raising it to 6.1%.
üìçLithuania has handed over 50,000 doses of the coronavirus vaccine to Armenia.
üìçAzerbaijan has started to use Armenian airspace for civilian flights.

entry.title: 18th annual Golden Apricot Film Festival kicks off in Yerevan

media:group.media:title: 18th annual Golden Apricot Film Festival kicks off in Yerevan
media:group.media:description:
The 18th annual Golden Apricot International Film Festival kicked off in Yerevan on October 3.
From October 3 to 10, Armenian film enthusiasts will have a unique opportunity to enjoy a number of special movies.
This year‚Äôs honorary guest to the festival is American screenwriter and director Paul Schrader. He is the screenwriter of Martin Scorsese's "Taxi Driver" and "Raging Bull".

entry.title: Azerbaijani civilian flights are now using Armenian airspace

media:group.media:title: Azerbaijani civilian flights are now using Armenian airspace
media:group.media:description:
Azerbaijan‚Äôs national carrier Azerbaijani Airlines is now using Armenian airspace for civilian flights on its Baku-Nakhichevan route. Although Armenia and Azerbaijan never officially closed their airspace to each other, air carriers of Azerbaijan have not used Armenia‚Äôs airspace since 2014.

entry.title: Armenia‚Äôs North-South highway will allow Iran to bypass Azerbaijan, says Iranian minister

media:group.media:title: Armenia‚Äôs North-South highway will allow Iran to bypass Azerbaijan, says Iranian minister
media:group.media:description:
üìçArmenian Foreign Minister Ararat Mirzoyan has held talks with Iranian Foreign Minister Hossein Amir-Abdullahian in Tehran.
üìçArmenia‚Äôs North-South highway will allow Iran to bypass Azerbaijan on the way to Europe, says Iranian official.
#CivilNet #’ç’´’æ’´’¨’Ü’•’© #DailyArmenia
Credits: Ruptly
